summary: libGDX is an open-source, cross-platform Java game development framework based on OpenGL (ES), supporting Windows, Linux, macOS, Android, web browsers, and iOS. It offers a flexible environment for rapid prototyping and development without imposing specific design or coding styles. The framework includes a variety of tools and features for creating 2D and 3D games, and it has a large third-party ecosystem for extending its functionality. libGDX is released under the Apache 2.0 License, allowing unrestricted usage in both commercial and non-commercial projects. The project provides comprehensive documentation, a setup tool, and a vibrant community for support and contributions.
